dict.string: AVRAI needs your location to show nearby spots and create personalized recommendations based on your unique preferences.
AVRAI needs location access to detect nearby spots and provide personalized recommendations even when the app is in the background, ensuring continuous learning per OUR_GUTS.md principles.
AVRAI needs background location access for continuous spot detection and ai2ai learning that respects your privacy while helping you discover places where you belong.
AVRAI uses Bluetooth for secure ai2ai communication between devices, enabling anonymous personality learning while maintaining your privacy and control.
AVRAI uses Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices for secure ai2ai learning, always respecting your privacy per OUR_GUTS.md principles.
AVRAI uses the camera to capture evidence for disputes (e.g., screenshots/photos) to help resolve issues fairly.
AVRAI needs access to your photo library so you can attach evidence (screenshots/photos) to disputes.
AVRAI may need microphone access for voice-based features and communications.
AVRAI uses the local network for secure ai2ai communication between nearby devices, enabling anonymous personality learning while maintaining your privacy.
